attributes.action: dissolve this Parliament, many of whose MPs have been found to have behaved shabbily, and who have lost the trust of the electorate. They should seek re-election - and if Mr Brown will not show leadership on this, we ask that this petition be presented to HM The Queen to dissolve Parliament herself.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
